name: Chaos Pegasus
text_description: Chaos Pegasus is a speedy and strong presence in any deck. Once per turn, you may choose to increase its speed by 1 until the end of the turn.
illustration_description: A majestic Pegasus radiating chaotic energies soars high above a raging storm. Its wings carry hues of dark purple and stormy grey, streaked with flashes of lightning.
